message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll find it valuable and worth the investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Could we perhaps negotiate the price down to $12000?

I understand that you're looking to keep expenses within a certain budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $14000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider at this point.
Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $13000?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $13000. I'm willing to meet you at $13500, which is the next best price I can offer. This is the last time I'll be willing to negotiate, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I understand your position, Alice. I will make one final attempt. Could we possibly agree on $13000 for the product?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $14000, Bob. I've already made several concessions and I'm at my limit. I'm willing to make one more offer, but this is my final counteroffer. I'll sell the product to you for $14000, and that's the best I can do.
